language._context: Indicates to the user that they should select a 'Language' for the application

book._context: Indicates to the user that they should select a 'Book' of the Bible

passage._context: Indicates to the user that they should select a 'Passage' from their chosen 'Book'

go._context: Indicates to the user that they can click on this button to move to next page with their given selections

downloadResourcesForOfflineUse._context: Button text telling the user to download resources for offline use

loading._context: Message to display in the options dropdown when things are loading

bible._context: Label for Bible button on navbar

guide._context: Label for Guide button on navbar

resources._context: Label for Resources button on navbar

title._context: Title for the top of the resource pane on the passage page

basicTab._context: Tab with basic resources in the resource pane

advancedTab._context: Tab with advanced resources in the resource pane

currentOfTotalLabel._context: Displays the current position out of the total fullscreen elements

ubsImages._context: Images from the United Bible Society

header._context: Header for when a Bible is not available in the current language

description.value:
No Bible is available on this device for {language}.
Do you want to use another language?
description._context: Description for when a Bible is not available in the current language

bible._context: Placeholder for selecting a Bible to show

noneAvailableDescription.value:
No Bible is available on this device for {language} or any other language.
Please download the content when you are online.
noneAvailableDescription._context: Description for when a Bible is not available in the current language or any other language

show._context: Show button to load in another language's Bible

checkForMoreResources._context: Link to go to the file manager and see more resources if Bible not available in the current language

noCbbterContent.value: No CBBT-ER content found for this passage.
noCbbterContent._context: Message to display when the CBBT-ER content is not downloaded or available

title._context: Title displayed on the file manager page

download._context: Table column heading for the column with checkboxes allowing the user to select content to download

language._context: Label for a dropdown allowing the user to select their language

passage._context: Table column heading for the column displaying passage names

book._context: Table column heading for the column for displaying book names

size._context: Table column heading for the column displaying file size

expand._context: Table column heading for the column with buttons allowing accordions to be expanded

type._context: Table column heading for the column displaying media type

textType._context: The media type for text, available to be downloaded

audioType._context: The media type for audio, available to be downloaded

mediaType._context: The media type for media, available to be downloaded

imagesType._context: The media type for images, available to be downloaded

update._context: Button to download/delete content based on what the user selected

chooseResource._context: Label for a dropdown allowing the user to select a resource to view

noInternet._context: Message to display when the user has no internet connection

selectABook._context: Label for a dropdown allowing the user to select a book to view

title._context: Title of the modal asking the user to confirm changes before syncing

description.value: You are about to download {downloadSize} and delete {deleteSize} of content from your device.
description._context: Shows on the modal asking the user to confirm changes before syncing

question.value: How would you like to proceed?
question._context: Question to ask the user before confirming

downloadProgress._context: Title of the modal showing the user how the download is progressing

success._context: Title of the modal showing the download was successful

downloadingDescription._context: Shows on the modal showing the user how the download is progressing

description.value: This is where you can download and delete Aquifer content from your device.

expandResources._context: Accessibility label for the button to expand the resources

collapseResources._context: Accessibility label for the button to collapse the resources

tyndaleBibleDictionary._context: Label for the Tyndale Bible Dictionary resource

tyndaleStudyNotes._context: Label for the Tyndale Study Notes resource

videoBibleDictionary._context: Label for the Video Bible Dictionary resource

recording._context: Button to create a recording for the passage

noPermission.value: Please update your settings and give permission for your microphone to be used
noPermission._context: Text to display when the user has not given permission for the microphone

languageLabel._context: Label for the language input field

versionLabel.value: What is the name of the translation?
versionLabel._context: Label for the version input field

versionAbbreviationLabel.value: What is a 3-letter abbreviation for this translation?
versionAbbreviationLabel._context: Label for the version abbreviation input field

discard._context: Button to close the modal and discard changes

step1._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

step2._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

step3._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

step4._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

step5._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

step6._context: See CBBT-ER for translations of each step name

home._context: The label for the home page

changeLanguage._context: The label for the change language button

fileManager._context: The label for the file manager button

error._context: The label for the error message

title._context: The title for the error message

message.value: If the issue persists, please check your internet connection.
message._context: The message for the error message

home._context: The label for the home button
